sentences.sContent: All reptiles have to slough their skin to grow.
sentences.sCn: 所有爬行动物都必须自然脱皮才能成长

synos.tran: 蜕下的皮（或壳）；绝境；[地理]泥沼；[外科]腐肉
蜕皮；脱落；在泥浆中跋涉

remMethod.val: s (音似： 四) + lough(湖) → 湖四周有很多泥坑 → 泥坑

words.tran: 脱落的；泥泞的；腐肉的；腐痂覆盖的

trans.tranOther: When a plant sloughs its leaves, or an animal such as a snake sloughs its skin, the leaves or skin come off naturally

trans.tranCn: 泥坑， 沼泽； 绝境
trans.tranOther: an area of land covered in deep dirty water or mud
